page.title: 07THORNTON COLLEGE
page.content: {Thornton College}is situated in beautiful{grounds},and the building itself is quite old.The{ grounds}cover twenty two acres and this includes a few of the surrounding fields. In the{grounds}are many statues dedicated to Jesus and Mary as the college is called the Convent of Jesus and Mary.There is a lovely statue of Mary in the{grounds}in a little grotto with engravings underneath.It is dedicated by a mother in the memory of her son. School facilities are good.One third of the girls are{boarders}and they board in another school building.
